shoes.name: Classic Oxford
shoes.description: Elegant leather oxford shoes perfect for formal occasions.

reviews.comment: Nice design, but a bit narrow for my feet.

faqs.question: Are these shoes true to size?
faqs.answer: Yes, we recommend ordering your usual size.

shoes.name: Athletic Sneakers
shoes.description: Versatile sneakers designed for sports and everyday wear.

reviews.comment: Love these shoes! Very comfortable and stylish.

faqs.question: Are these shoes good for running?
faqs.answer: Yes, they provide excellent support for running.

faqs.question: Do they come in other colors?
faqs.answer: Yes, they are available in black, blue, and red.

shoes.name: Casual Loafers
shoes.description: Comfortable slip-on loafers for casual wear.

reviews.comment: Nice loafers, but the sole is a bit thin.
Great value for money, very comfortable.

faqs.question: Are these loafers true to size?
faqs.answer: Yes, we recommend ordering your usual size.

faqs.question: Do they have arch support?
faqs.answer: Yes, they provide decent arch support.
